##2.1 Arithmetic with R

```{R}
2+2
2-2
2*2
4/2

```
##2.2~7 Variable Assignment
```{R}
var <- 1

print(var)

my_pencils <- 5
my_pens <- 6

my_pencils+my_pens

my_desktools <- my_pencils+my_pens
my_desktools

numVar <- 72
charVar <- "Dany"
LogicVar <- TRUE

class(numVar)
class(charVar)
class(LogicVar)
```

```{r}
Dany

bool_v
```
